title: Rhodesia and Nyasaland today
creator_credit: Gordon Bradley, Associated Television and Rank Organisation Film Productions
brief_description: Surveys the progress and problems of Rhodesia and Nyasaland; the African quarter of Harari; tobacco plantations; Government farming schemes; industrial training; Victoria Falls; Kariba power station; Nyasaland’s tea production. Transition of Africans from their way of life to the European pattern.
